title: Like the Real Game, Without Limits
subtitle: BBPS offers a complete Boom Beach experience — unlimited resources, powerful commands, and an active community, always synced to the latest version.

items.heading: Unlimited Resources & Diamonds
items.description: Say goodbye to long waits and in-app purchases. Enjoy unlimited diamonds, gold, wood, stone, and iron to build and upgrade freely.

items.heading: Powerful Game Commands
items.description: Execute complex operations through simple chat commands. Manage your base and troops with convenience features not available in the original game.

items.heading: Active Community
items.description: Join our player community to discuss strategies, share base layouts, and compete in rankings and seasonal events.
bullets: Real-time chat via QQ and comments

items.heading: Web-Based Map Editor
items.description: Design your perfect base layout with our custom web editor. No downloads required — works right in your browser.
